content:
Sani says when fishing,
you need to feel for the moment when the fish bites.

The feeling of the fishing rod sinking
is just like that moment of suspension
right before her car takes flight.

I tried fishing recently,
it was really fun! And I discovered that
if you charge up your cast, you can throw the line much further~

Stargazing requires a lot of patience,
just like fishing.

I once saw what looked like a snow sculpture by the seaside,
When I went up and touched it, it moved! (Yikes!)
...Turns out it was just a fisherman waiting patiently in the snow.
